topics.body:
Y'know what would be really cool? If HBO decided to give a television adaptaion of the Neil Gaiman story American Gods. I mean Game of Thrones exists so why not do something more modern and contemporary? I said it earlier that Gaiman's stories work best when they have a visual medium. And American Gods is arguably one of his best works. But I digress. I must be off to play the masterpiece that is Persona 4. Until next time.

-SquiggyBomb
